results.title: Syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone secretion associated with lisinopril.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To describe a case of the @DISEASE_Inappropriate_ADH_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D007177 @@@syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone secretion@@@ (@DISEASE_Inappropriate_ADH_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D007177 @@@SIADH@@@) associated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy. CASE SUMMARY: A 76-year-old white @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who was being treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ for @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ presented with @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headaches@@@ accompanied by @DISEASE_Nausea @DISEASE_MESH:D009325 @@@nausea@@@ and a @<m>DISEASE_Paresthesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010292 @@@tingling sensation@@@ in her arms.

citations.NLM: Shaikh ZH, Taylor HC, Maroo PV, Llerena LA. Syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone secretion associated with lisinopril. Ann Pharmacother. 2000 Feb;34(2):176-9. PMID: 10676825
citations.BibTeX: @article{10676825, title={Syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone secretion associated with lisinopril.}, author={Shaikh ZH and Taylor HC and Maroo PV and Llerena LA}, journal={Ann Pharmacother}, volume={34}, number={2}, pages={176-9}}

results.title: Acute Ascending Muscle Weakness Secondary to Medication-Induced Hyperkalemia
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ reported compliance with daily @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ 10 mg, @CHEMICAL_Spironolactone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013148 @@@spironolactone@@@ 25 mg, and 40 mEq twice daily of @CHEMICAL_Potassium_Chloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011189 @@@potassium chloride@@@.

citations.NLM: Kimmons LA, Usery JB. Acute Ascending Muscle Weakness Secondary to Medication-Induced Hyperkalemia Case Rep Med. 2014;2014():789529. PMID: 24782897
citations.BibTeX: @article{24782897, title={Acute Ascending Muscle Weakness Secondary to Medication-Induced Hyperkalemia}, author={Kimmons LA and Usery JB}, journal={Case Rep Med}, volume={2014}, pages={789529}}
